meanings.sent1: The calligrapher carefully wrote the wedding invitations.
meanings.sent2: The calligrapher's work was displayed in the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: The calligrapher's pen danced across the paper with grace.
meanings.sent4: The calligrapher's words painted a picture of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The calligrapher's skill with a pen was truly impressive.

meanings.definition: One who specializes in the art of beautiful handwriting.
meanings.sent1: The talented calligrapher created stunning birthday cards.
meanings.sent2: The calligrapher's handwriting was admired by all who saw it.
meanings.sent3: The calligrapher's pen seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The calligrapher's artistry transformed words into beauty.
meanings.sent5: The calligrapher's handiwork was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: An expert in the art of decorative writing.
meanings.sent1: The calligrapher added intricate designs to the manuscript.
meanings.sent2: The calligrapher's decorative writing adorned the certificates.
meanings.sent3: The calligrapher's pen turned words into works of art.
meanings.sent4: The calligrapher's creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The calligrapher's expertise in decorative writing was unmatched.
